item.title: Permanent Delete on OSX (Windows Shift + Delete Alternative)
item.description: Create an Automator service or application to facilitate executing the rm shell command, which will permanently delete files or folders and skip the trash. For example, start with creating a new Service in Automator.app. Select files or folders as input, you probably also want to limit the availability of this service to the Finder app. Optionally, but highly recommended, first add an Ask for Confirmation step to the workflow.
